name: Type Hard
description:
You are the head of security at Assembly. The compo is about to begin, but the power of Guage is too strong...

Yell increasingly difficult words at the unruly partygoers to shut them up and make them turn off their monitors.

Every second counts and if the organizer's V-curve reaches the top, Assembly could be cancelled forever!

Yippee-ki-yay, motherfuckers...
